title: Fans and Alan Carr found Geri Horner's Drag Race stint really awkward
text:
Maybe next time, Geri (Picture: BBC Three)

Geri Horner was guest judge on RuPaul’s Drag Race but fans were less than impressed by her personality.

Ginger Spice must have been new to the Drag Race world as she seemed shocked and impressed by all the wrong things.

When it came to the cat walk, Blu Hydrangea came out dressed as a literal eye ball and the jokes would not stop flowing.

However, Geri was either not interested or didn’t understand it.

RuPaul told Geri: ‘Geri, the eye is the window to the hole,’ to which she replied: ‘But that’s not a happy hole.’

The singer got queasy and shocked over the outfits (Picture: BBC Three)

For some reason, the former Spice Girl seemed shocked about the entire Drag ordeal, whether it be from innuendos or dramatic outfits.

Fans took to Twitter to share their opinions on the 47-year-old singer.

She’s doing her best (Picture: BBC Three)

One fan tweeted: ‘Snatch Game was AMAZING. But did anyone else find Geri just…. awkward? #DragRaceUK #SnatchGame’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘My god Geri Halliwell is dull isn’t she,’ another tweeted.

Oof, maybe she’s just nervous about her first time on Drag Race, guys!

Another use tweeted: ‘Geri trying to feign the remotest bit of interest.’

That's right queens, we've got an EXCLUSIVE snatch game ru-veal for you! Watch as @THEVIVIENNEUK tries to decide between three different characters. #DragRaceUK pic.twitter.com/jFxPTXz1YD — RuPaul's Drag Race UK (@dragraceukbbc) October 23, 2019

Meanwhile, Alan Carr recently shaded Geri over her guest appearance on the BBC Three show.

He slammed Geri for being ‘outraged by everything,’ during her stint as a guest judge and claimed that the Spice Girl was ‘grabbing her pearls’ at some of the looks and comments that she saw and heard on the runway.

We guess fans and Alan can agree on that, then.

‘This is a woman who, at the Brits, came out of an inflatable vagina singing Bag It Up! And she was grabbing her pearls! I was shocked,’ he said.

‘I remember the Geri with the big old tits and Union Jack dress causing trouble – but she was like Maggie Smith in Downton Abbey! I was like, “Wake up, Geri!”‘

Guys, guys, guys. She might have just had a bad day.

This is Ginger Spice we’re talking about.

description: Geri Horner had a guest appearance on RuPaul's Drag Race UK and fans thought she was super 'awkward' to watch.
